Loading Datasets

To load either FASTA or PDB file is the same procedure: Clicking on a button or , for PDB or FASTA files respectively. These buttons are located in the toolbar or the File menu. You can also press the key combination Ctrl. + B or Ctrl + F, for PDB or FASTA datasets respectively. Both cases launch a window for selecting the datasets to load.

The PDB and FASTA file open dialog

Removing Datasets

To stop using a dataset preloaded. Press the Remove ( ) button in the toolbar or File menu. Also you can press the key combination Ctrl. + D. All these options will launch the following warning:

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
